name: chilan-berry
effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder would take normal-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a Normal-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
Normal-type attack.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
Normal-type attack.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
Normal-type attack.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Weakens a Normal-type attack against
the Pokémon holding this berry.
